import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-offer-menu2', templateUrl: './offer-menu2.component.html', styleUrls: ['./offer-menu2.component.scss'] }) export class OfferMenu2Component { array=[1,2,3,4]; addDiv(){ this.array.push(this.array[this.array.length-1]+1); } }
